revised_title: Catalytic Activity of Metallic Surfaces in Solid and Liquid States
tldr: The authors conducted experiments to study the change in the area and catalytic activity of metallic surfaces when transitioning from the solid to the liquid state. They found that the accessible area of the surface remains constant, while the total catalytic activity depends on three factors. The study also showed a decrease in specific catalytic activity when a metal passes from the solid to the liquid state.
